column5: Despite my name i have never owned a fishfinder. I want to buy one now after using Uncle Bucks, and realizing what a help it was.. I would like one with an LCD though to be used in the summer, as well as in the winter.. My budget is under 200 $ Any suggestions? Thanks!
Well with a bit more you can get the Eagle Fish mark 320 with an LCD and Flasher at Lebarons. Its $209.00. Not including taxed that is.
or u could get one for 40 bux, like mine lol, check it out  http://images.google.com/imgres?imgurl=htt...l%3Den%26sa%3DN

I have just purchased this one to take with me on vacations where i'll be renting a boat, and to use on my personal pontoon out in the Gulf of Mexico.  http://www.basspro.com/servlet/catalog.Tex...arTarget=browse  This is one I also considered.  http://www.basspro.com/servlet/catalog.Tex...arTarget=browse  I hope this helps!
Thanks for the responses guys, What are the main differences between the cheap fishfinders and the more expensive ones? Other than the pirce, lol
i would geuss, picture, how many pixels, features, accuarcy...

I got your pm fishfinder. Yeah  I own a Fish Mark 320 since last year. I love it. The graphics is great and I'm happy with with. It has THE FEATURES OF BOTH WORLDS a LCD screen and flasher. Plus all the the other stuff that comes with a regular fish finder. Bells and whistles.   Here's link. And I have caught fish with it.LOL Eagle Products
DSN, Do you have the portable or the normal version? http://www.basspro.com/servlet/catalog.Tex...arTarget=browse Thanks for the help, im probably going to go with the 320.

I have the portable one.   I friend of mine has the piranha. I also took a look at the Cuda before I decided on the Eagle Fish Mark 320. The Cuda is good. I like the bright colors and white background. But I wish they made a more horizontal screen instead of vertical. Just my prefference cause you get a wider screen.  dsn
Hey man one more question, do you have any problems with it in the cold weather, i heard the lcd can crack. Thanks!
This is my Second Eagle product and I have never had a cracked LCD screen.  I'm usually using it in a hut so I can't answer that one for you. Sorry   dsn
